A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I did a little survey after this movie came out.  I went around a retirement home and asked people who had seen a Star Wars movie before one simple question. 

"Do you think Luke Skywalker would ever try to kill his nephew in his sleep?"
0% of respondents though it was in-character for Luke.  

This movie ruins one of the most beloved characters in cinema history.
